item.title: [afr] Cloister Gargoyle
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Gargoyle

When Cloister Gargoyle enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

As long as you've completed a dungeon, Cloister Gargoyle gets +3/+0 and has flying.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/adventures-in-the-forgotten-realms-variants

item.title: [afr] Portable Hole
item.description:
Artifact

When Portable Hole enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less until Portable Hole leaves the battlefield.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/adventures-in-the-forgotten-realms-variants

item.title: [afr] Flumph
item.description:
Creature — Jellyfish

Defender, flying

Whenever Flumph is dealt damage, you and target opponent each draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/adventures-in-the-forgotten-realms-variants

item.title: [afr] Tasha's Hideous Laughter
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until that player has exiled cards with total mana value 20 or more.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/adventures-in-the-forgotten-realms-variants

item.title: [afr] Power Word Kill
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target non-Angel, non-Demon, non-Devil, non-Dragon creature.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/adventures-in-the-forgotten-realms-variants

item.title: [afr] Prosperous Innkeeper
item.description:
Creature — Halfling Citizen

When Prosperous Innkeeper enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/adventures-in-the-forgotten-realms-variants

item.title: [afr] Nadaar, Selfless Paladin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon Knight

Vigilance

Whenever Nadaar, Selfless Paladin enters the battlefield or attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you've completed a dungeon.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/adventures-forgotten-realms-mechanics-2021-06-24

item.title: [afr] Nadaar, Selfless Paladin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon Knight

Vigilance

Whenever Nadaar, Selfless Paladin enters the battlefield or attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you've completed a dungeon.

item.title: [afr] Shortcut Seeker
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Whenever Shortcut Seeker deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/adventures-forgotten-realms-mechanics-2021-06-24

item.title: [afr] Gloom Stalker
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Ranger

As long as you've completed a dungeon, Gloom Stalker has double strike.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/adventures-forgotten-realms-mechanics-2021-06-24

item.title: [afr] Ellywick Tumblestrum
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ellywick

+1: Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

−2: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. If it's legendary, you gain 3 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have trample and haste and get +2/+2 for each differently named dungeon you've completed."

http://www.codenameentertainment.com/?page=blog&post_id=1240

item.title: [afr] Ellywick Tumblestrum
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ellywick

+1: Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

−2: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. If it's legendary, you gain 3 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have trample and haste and get +2/+2 for each differently named dungeon you've completed."

http://www.codenameentertainment.com/?page=blog&post_id=1240

item.title: [afr] Tiamat
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon God

Flying

When Tiamat enters the battlefield, if you cast it, search your library for up to five Dragon cards not named Tiamat that each have different names, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

https://wpn.wizards.com/en/article/love-your-local-game-store-promotion-continues-july-23-us

item.title: [plg21] Dig Through Time
item.description:
Instant

Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [plg21] Aven Mindcensor
item.description:
Creature — Bird Wizard

Flash

Flying

If an opponent would search a library, that player searches the top four cards of that library instead.

item.title: [plg21] Goblin Guide
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Scout

Haste

Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into their hand.

item.title: [plg21] Bolas's Citadel
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.

{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

item.title: [plg21] Scavenging Ooze
item.description:
Creature — Ooze

{G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [sld] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Primal Vigor
item.description:
Enchantment

If one or more tokens would be created, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.

item.title: [sld] Impact Tremors
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Impact Tremors deals 1 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [sld] Whir of Invention
item.description:
Instant

Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Hero's Downfall
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [sld] Unbreakable Formation
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Mother of Runes
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

{T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Bloom Tender
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.
